product_name: YETI Cooler Drain Plug - Package of 2
long_description: Designed for YETI Tundra and Roadie coolers (sold separately), this screw-in, gasketed drain plug is leakproof and rugged, and will drain when partially open without having to fully remove the plug.
short_description: Designed for YETI Tundra and Roadie coolers (sold separately), this screw-in, gasketed drain plug is leakproof and rugged, and will drain when partially open without having to fully remove the plug.
